title: Stoneborn pact + Frozen heart?
body: Still downloading the patch, was wondering if anyone knows if these two interact yet.

replies.body:
No, it's _**movement related CC only**_
Frozen Heart only slow attack speed, **not** movement.
Omen would work with it however.
So then... Swain with Rylais?  might be an interesting interaction...

Nope, checking in a Practice Mode game right now. Only movement CC triggers it. This includes items like Frozen Mallet.
Then riot needs to make some edits, based on what they were said, and then repeated by phreak on his stream, they said any.
I don't know what Phreak said, but the tooltip is clear.

I just watched the hour long youtube video he put up about it, and he says is : 
"This means Nami E (movement slow), Omen (movement slow), Malphite Q (movement slow), slowing people with Singed W (movement slow). As long as there is a slow it will come into effect (meaning movement speed slowing because it only applies the mark with _**movement impairing**_ effects)."

Directly from the Keystone's tool tip.
Your _**movement impairing effects**_ brand enemy champions with an Earthen Rune for 4 seconds. Other allied champions who attack branded enemies heal for 5 (+ 2.5% of your maximum health) over 2 seconds (halved to 2.5 (+ 1.25% of your maximum health) if you are ranged).

It has to be movement related CC, which has nothing to do with attack speed.
Omen works with it though.
Yea i know, i was thinking mallet/ gauntlet hahaha
